mapper.select: SELECT A.PLACE_SEQ , PLACE_AREA , PLACE_NAME , PLACE_TYPE , PLACE_OPENTIME , PLACE_CLOSETIME , PLACE_SPENDTIME , PLACE_LOCATION , PLACE_DETAIL , PLACE_IMAGE , PLACE_COST , PLACE_HOMEPAGE FROM PLACE A, PLACE_THEME B WHERE A.PLACE_SEQ=B.PLACE_SEQ AND A.PLACE_AREA=#{place_area} AND B.PLACE_THEME_FOOD=1 ORDER BY B.PLACE_THEME_FOOD DESC
